name: sarus

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: ssh
variants.description: Build and install the SSH hook and custom SSH software to enable connections inside containers.Requires a static version of the glibc libraries (including libcrypt) to be available on the system

description: Sarus is an OCI-compliant container engine for HPC systems.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: expat
dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: cpprestsdk
dependencies.description:
The C++ REST SDK is a Microsoft project for cloud-based client-server
communication in native code using a modern asynchronous C++ API design.
This project aims to help C++ developers connect to and interact with
services.

dependencies.name: libarchive
dependencies.description:
libarchive: C library and command-line tools for reading and writing
tar, cpio, zip, ISO, and other archive formats.

dependencies.name: rapidjson
dependencies.description: A fast JSON parser/generator for C++ with both SAX/DOM style API

dependencies.name: runc
dependencies.description:
CLI tool for spawning containers on Linux according to the OCI
specification

dependencies.name: tini
dependencies.description: A tiny but valid `init` for containers

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
